ComicInfo.Title: Inherit the Earth part Three: Re-Entry Shock; Tales of ZvR: Of Metal and Bones; The Orphan Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
“Inherit the Earth!,” part 3! Space-faring humans have returned to Earth to find it still dead but crawling with oddly sentient zombies, robots and… Mermen! Finally! Also: Niles and Mayerik continue to help rebuild the mythos in unexpected ways!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ashley Wood | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | James Stokoe | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-07 10:31:23. [CVDB483398]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Characters: Ann Tran, Cesar Ortiz, Finola Moorpark, Jenae Jefferson, Jukka Elfson, Rosemary, Zeb Nova
